TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed UIImageRenderingMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: An enumeration whose values specify rendering modes for a .

remarks.para: A template image is used as a mask to create the final image. A template image inherits the of its parent. Application developers who do not want this behavior should use .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype UIKit.UIImageRenderingMode AlwaysOriginal = int64(1)

Docs.summary: Always draws the original image, without treating it as a template.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype UIKit.UIImageRenderingMode AlwaysTemplate = int64(2)

Docs.summary: Always draws the image as a template, ignoring its color information.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype UIKit.UIImageRenderingMode Automatic = int64(0)

Docs.summary: The default rendering mode for the context.
